description:
Yoshiko finds her soldier, Ryuuichi, in tatters. Yoshiko asks what happened,
and he responds that he was done in by guys who have wasted bananas.
Yoshiko stands silently, anger boiling up from within. They are
unforgiveable! I shall fight! Yes! For bananas everywhere! ...wait, bananas?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Final Battle! Decisive Blow! Aho Girl
決戦! 必殺! アホガール
